sub_title: India Region Manager - OSS at Nokia
summary:
A technology driven professional with around 19+ years of experience working across several markets in various capacities within Services in several domains including Assurance, Fulfillment, Analytics and Care/service Delivery. 

- Passionate about building and leading strong teams, 
- Expert in setting up multi-site operations, establishing global practices and developing strategic plans/roadmaps
- Excited about identifying opportunities and using technology to solve everyday problems

Specialties: Server Consolidation & Virtualization | Green Datacenter | Capacity Planning | Cloud Computing | Consulting | Implementation | Assessment | Architecture | OSS (NetAct) | SQM / Traffica / Reporting Suites / Global Reporter / NPM / IP products (CISCO/NORTEL/SANDVINE)

Professional Certification
----------------------------
	Accelerated Leadership from Harvard Business
	ITIL
	Higher National Diploma in Computing (Software Engineering) from Edexcel International, U.K.

profile_positions.title: India Region Manager - OSS

profile_positions.description:
	Managing EMEA Care delivery as a OSS Stream Manager
	Providing Consulting Service related with OSS/BSS
	Provide Customized support to global customer
	Coaching Engineers
	Planning & implementing OSS Projects and its Management
	Having In-depth knowledge of OSS (NetAct) / SQM / Traffica / RS / GR / NPM

Certification
------------------
* OSS Installation & Commissioning
* OSS Up-gradation
* OSS Admin
* SQM

	Key Result Areas

•	Project Initiation
•	Project Planning
•	Project Execution
•	Project Monitoring
•	Project closing
•	Product & Efficiency Improvement

•	Communication & Training
•	Performance, Fault & Configuration Management
profile_positions.title: OSS Stream Manager

profile_positions.description:
Telecommunication Technical Areas :

-Domain knowledge on Operation Support Systems, Element Management System.
-Knowledge of FCAPS and OSS applications
-Exposure to NSN (Nokia Siemens Networks) Network management solution NetAct applications, NetAct hardware.
-Exposure to NSN Element management solution such as Radio Commander, Switch Commander, Advantage Commander, TMNS, Net Manager
-Understanding on higher management solution (HP Openview, NetCool)
-Integration of OSS and Network Elements
-Business case understanding for OSS solution

Virtualization:-  Expertise on different Virtualization Technology like VMware Virtual Infrastructure (vCenter 2.5/4, ESX 3.5, vSphere 4.x, VMware Update manager, Xen etc.) 

Storage:- Dell Storage Power Vault MD3000i, EMC, NetAPP

DataCenter Operation:- Management of mid scale datacenter, significant understanding of core datacenter infrastructure components and requirements. 

Operating System:- Depth knowledge of configuring, administrating and troubleshooting Linux (Open Source) operating systems.

Hardware:- Worked on different kind of IBM, HP & DELL hardware. 

OS Provisioning:- Linux Kickstart, ESX Kickstart.

Server Side:

- Apache, Sendmail, SMTP, POP, IMAP, Installed, configured and implemented monitoring software like Nagios with failover. Console connectivity using KVM console, DjbDNS, IPTABLES, LIDS, LVS, MySQL, and Qmail. 

IP Products:

- Sandvine / Cisco / Nortel Passport (MSS)

Personal Attributes:

- Ability to learn complex technology
- Flexible and hard working
- Logical and analytical capabilities.
- Microsoft tool proficiency
- Calm persona,
- Enthusiasm to share knowledge and coach teams with diverse experience levels.
- Highly motivated and good team player
- Networking skills
- Uses non standard approaches to resolving issues
- Suggests improvements and seeks opportunities for innovation
profile_positions.title: Manager (OSS)

profile_positions.description:
Integration/deployment/patch management

Help Telecom operator to monitor/manage entire network remotely
profile_positions.title: OSS Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Operations and Support
 Perform daily system monitoring, verify integrity and availability of all hardware, server resources, systems and key processes, review system and
application logs, and verify completion of scheduled jobs such as backups.
 Perform regular security monitoring to identify any possible intrusions.
 Perform daily backup operations, ensuring all required file systems and system data are successfully backed up to the appropriate media, recovery tapes or
disks are created, and media is recycled and sent off site as necessary.
 Perform regular file archival and purge as necessary.
 Create, change, and delete user accounts per request.
Maintenance
 Apply OS patches and upgrades on a regular basis, and upgrade administrative tools and utilities. Configure / add new services as necessary.
 Maintain operational, configuration, or other procedures.
 Perform periodic performance reporting to support capacity planning.
 Perform ongoing performance tuning, hardware upgrades, and resource optimization as required. Configure CPU, memory, and disk partitions as required.
 Maintain data centre environmental and monitoring equipment.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator
